metadata.Title: CVE-2014-3625 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Directory traversal vulnerability in Pivotal Spring Framework 3.0.4 through 3.2.x before 3.2.12, 4.0.x before 4.0.8, and 4.1.x before 4.1.2 allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via unspecified vectors, related to static resource handling. It was discovered that Spring Framework incorrectly handled inputs. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to read arbitrary files.

criterions.comment: libspring-java package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2.12-1').
